release.action: Serializability added for a few classes
serialVersionUID field added for most classes
License has changed from GPL to LGPL
Code has been reformatted and @uml tags are removed
Serializability has been added in a number of classes
ObjectJTable: Now searches for registered Object[] and Collection renderers when encountering a composite object.
ICellPresentationConfigProvider interface introduced which allows propagation of a cell presentation configuration across multiple introspection dialogs.
AbstractProperty now correctly tests for a Collection class.
IntrospectionDialog now disables add-remove buttons on read-only collection properties.
SortingTableModel now infos rather than warns for Comparable errors.
